metadata.Plot: A teen comedy about a nerdy teenager who creates an iPhone app to be his girlfriend. When she miraculously comes to life, things go hilariously wrong, and she tries to kill him.
metadata.Actors: Dalton Edward Phillips, Tony Vespe, Kelsey Pribilski
